entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 1:46 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: ESE 32 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
